title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 810.5 - Eligible projects
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 810.5 - Eligible projects

State Regulations

Any project which is conducted by an eligible applicant and
which provides occupational safety and health education and/or training
services to employees and/or employers, or educational services as required
under article 28 of the Labor Law, or training and education for employees
concerning the prevention of occupational disease and injuries, and any other
services deemed effective to promote the prevention of occupational accidents
and illness, shall be eligible for funding under this
program. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
810.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
